item.title: Python in R
item.description: Hey there everyone! Welcome to my first blog post ever about cool coding techniques I learned this semester at The University of Texas! In my SDS 348 class, we have learned how to interact two programming languages, R code and Python. In this blog, I will be disussing some basic steps on how both these two programming worlds can colide and work together! library(reticulate) UT<-"Hook'em" #Python code UT="horns forever!" print(r.
